## OIT.calculateHash() method

Calculates the hash of the renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract calculateHash(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

The hash of the renderer.

## Remarks

When this hash value was changed, material shader will be forced recreate.
